About the Company: Ramky Infrastructure Ltd (RIL) is one of the leading civil and infrastructure engineering companies in India.RIL has been involved in water and waste water projects, transportation projects, irrigation projects, industrial projects and parks (including SEZs), power transmission and distribution projects, residential, commercial and retail property developments and a transport terminal development. RIL operates in two principal business segments: (i) Construction business, which is operated by the company, and (ii) Developer business, which comprises nine subsidiaries and associates. In addition to construction business and developer business, the companys 100% owned subsidiary in the United Arab Emirates, operates a small consultancy business.
